sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax that House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., was wrong to tell athletes at the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics not to protest.
author: Nick Koutsobinas
title: Rep. Jim Jordan to Newsmax: Pelosi Wrong to Tell Olympians Not to Speak Out

sentence: A host of prominent conservatives will speak at CPAC this weekend, from U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz to former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, U.S. Sen. Marco Rubio and U.S. Rep. Jim Jordan.
title: DeSantis, Trump to speak at CPAC

sentence: "Apart from the former president himself, his son Donald Trump Jr., former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, Senator Ted Cruz, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, Nigel Farage, and Rep Jim Jordan are among the high-profile speakers.While devoted fans are anticipating Trump's undeniably poignant and likely lengthy speech (as usual), other prominent conservatives took their moment to weigh in.
title: The Republican Awakening

sentence: You know, everyone loves Jim Jordan here.
title: At CPAC, Trump delivers a reminder of his muscle

sentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin has taken advantage of a lack of leadership in the White House to carry out his invasion of Ukraine, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax on Wednesday.
author: Brian Freeman
title: Rep. Jim Jordan to Newsmax: Putin Takes Advantage of WH Weakness

sentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin has taken advantage of a lack of leadership in the White House to carry out his invasion of Ukraine, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax on Wednesday.
author: Brian Freeman
title: Rep. Jim Jordan to Newsmax: Putin Takes Advantage of WH Weakness
